name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a proactive Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing and implementing AI models while creating engaging educational content to aid in technical assessments and coding challenges. My robust expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** technologies positions me well to integrate AI-driven insights into high-performance solutions across sectors like healthcare and finance. 
I have a strong foundation in software engineering principles and a proven track record in building enterprise-grade platforms with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My experience includes comprehensive cloud services with **Azure** and **AWS** to enhance application deployment and scalability. 
With a solid background in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I focus on creating secure, compliant applications while utilizing CI/CD automation to enhance project efficiency. I bring expertise in developing machine learning pipelines and serving models in production environments, leveraging tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. I possess strong critical thinking, communication, and collaboration skills, enabling me to effectively work with cross-functional teams and deliver impactful results.
